name: Use Your Head
description:
From the winners of UAT Founder's Day Game Jam 2019 in Best Design, comes the platformer puzzle game Use Your Head.

Play as the Headless Horseman as you navigate through a particularly spooky dungeon. Utilizing his body for offense and his head for problem solving, you must make your way through the treacherous enemies and dangerous obstacles that await.

Credits:

Uriel Munguia  - Lead Programmer, 3D Modeler, Level Design

Jonathon Sherwood - Lead Design, Programmer

Elijah Nutter - Lead Artist, Animation

Ben Branch - Lead Sound Design, Modeler

Jacob Freeman - Designer, Level Designer
